games.name: Balatro
games.description: A roguelike deck-builder that twists poker rules with powerful Jokers and wild synergies, letting players craft clever hands and take strategic risks.

games.name: Game Dev Tycoon
games.description: A simulation game where players manage a video game development company. Design games, research new technologies, hire staff, and make strategic business decisions to become the ultimate game development mogul.

games.name: Stardew Valley
games.description: Stardew Valley is a relaxing farming and life simulator. Plant crops, raise animals, mine for resources, build relationships with townspeople, and explore secrets in a charming pixel world full of activities and adventure.
